laboratory_examinations.findings: Special stains of BAL specimens did not reveal cytomegalovirus (CMV), acid-fast bacilli, fungi, or other bacteria. BAL fluid and blood cultures grew C. immitis.
Negative results for pretransplantation complement-fixing antibody (CFA) tests for C. immitis were noted.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: CFA tests performed before and 1 and 10 months after transplantation were negative for SOTR 3.
